subject: Officiating (Sports)
Basketball
Gambling
lead_paragraph: Tim Donaghy left the basketball court as a disgraced former N.B.A. referee in July and left a federal court room Wednesday as an admitted criminal, a conspirator and a gambling addict.
snippet: Tim Donaghy left the basketball court as a disgraced former N.B.A. referee in July and left a federal court room Wednesday as an admitted criminal, a conspirator and a gambling addict.
